thread.title: This monsoon, hear the sound of the rain, spot rare birds and enjoy organic foods in Ubud, Indonesia
thread.title_full: This monsoon, hear the sound of the rain, spot rare birds and enjoy organic foods in Ubud, Indonesia

title: This monsoon, hear the sound of the rain, spot rare birds and enjoy organic foods in Ubud, Indonesia
text: 0 BREAKING NEWS This monsoon, hear the sound of the rain, spot rare birds and enjoy organic foods in Ubud, Indonesia By ET Bureau | 6 Aug, 2015, 05.20AM IST   By Rashmi Hemrajani Explore the popular holiday destinations in Asia during monsoon season to enjoy a romantic, relaxing and refreshing holiday. Travelling during the monsoon season in Asia can be just as pleasant as any other time. With a little luck and timing, you'll still get to enjoy plenty of sunny days along with less crowds. In many Asian countries, especially those in Southeast Asia , July to September are the months when seasonal packages are offered in plenty. Many resorts offer special discounts, so make the most of your time and buck, while you venture on a memorable holiday as you see the wet earth reviving and bursting with life under the showers. Wellness retreats Region: Ubud Indonesia is one of the ideal destinations to visit during monsoons. The weather is warm and the temperatures range between 25° to 30°C. Reconnect with nature in Ubud as you stay in resorts that are surrounded by paddy fields and jungle. This town is perfect for detox retreats for tourists looking to have a holistic vacation. Devoted to mind-body-spirit programmes, Ubud is a favourite among travellers. There are plenty of feel-good massages and facials, as well as a variety of wellness therapies for tourists. Book yourself for a five-day retreat that focuses on yoga, pilates, martial arts and other wellness practices, and a diet of organic and raw cuisine. If you want to participate in some activities, there's lots to choose from including hiking, biking and rafting amid Bali's stunning jungle and river gorges.
